name: Christmas Platformer (Android)
description:
I made this silly little mobile game I made for the Secret Santa Game Jam. I didn't have much time so it's not very polished, but hopefully it's still fun!

Drag your finger to tilt the joystick, and press the button to jump.

Collect as many candy canes as you can!

Music:

"Deck the Halls B" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
